title: Towns Music - Audio Pack
longDescription:
Hello Dev!


This music pack was created thinking about RPG or Adventure games where the hero goes through several cities of different styles. And its influence is based on famous old-school roleplaying games.


Cities are according to the most common races, such as elves, dwarfs, fairies, giants, goblins, and also places, such as desert, beach, medieval empire, ancient city, among others.


By purchasing this pack you automatically have access to all this material! Making your game go to another level :D And it still helps me to continue with my work as an incentive.


CHECK THE PREVIEW

CHECK THE DOCUMENTATION


Here's the Full List of Songs:


  1. Anciente Town (02:07)
  2. Beach Town (01:18)
  3. Desert Town (01:04)
  4. Dwarfs Town (01:09)
  5. Elfs Town (02:00)
  6. Fairy Town (01:31)
  7. Future Town (01:25)
  8. Ghost Town (01:09)
  9. Giants Town (01:37)
  10. Goblins Town (01:12)
  11. Heavens Town (01:28)
  12. Imperial Town (01:27)
  13. Market Town (01:47)
  14. Medieval Town (01:31)
  15. Rebel Town (01:12)

non-exclusive license – you’re free to use these packs in your commercial games. No license to claim as your own work.

Supported Development Platforms:
